summary: Provides a command‑line utility to transform Stable Diffusion XL LoRA weight files from the Diffusers library format into checkpoint formats used by popular web‑based interfaces, handling both PEFT and Kohya style conversions and saving the results as safetensors.
business_intent: Enable developers and end‑users to migrate and reuse LoRA adapters across different AI model ecosystems, reducing friction when switching between Diffusers and web UI platforms.
